article.title: Wolf Creek to Support Range Communications
article.text:
Wolf Creek Federal Services Inc., Anchorage, Alaska, has been awarded a $19,050,151 option modification (P00003) to the previously awarded contract FA2521-15-C-0063 for range operations support. Contractor will provide for non-mission support communications for the Eastern Range and Western Range; and base operating support and logistics for the Eastern Range, primarily Ascension Auxiliary Air Field. Work will be performed at Patrick Air Force Base, Florida; Cape Canaveral Air Force Station, Florida, and Ascension Auxiliary Air Field, Florida, and is expected to be complete by Sept. 30, 2016. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance funds are being used and no funds were obligated at the time of award. The 45th Contracting Squadron, Patrick Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
